QuestData.Title: Making Mutiny
QuestData.Description: Before returning to Booty Bay, you should do everything you can to weaken the Bloodsail Buccaneers. Unfortunately, even as captain, you're prohibited from killing other buccaneers in cold blood. Only a Fleet Master can do that.$b$bYou can, however, put mutineers to the sword... and mutiny can be awfully hard to disprove.$b$bSpeaking of which, those Bloodsail corsairs that hang out on the lowest level of the ships have been acting awfully suspicious...
QuestData.LogDescription: Accuse 9 Bloodsail Corsairs of mutiny, then kill them.
QuestData.CompletionText: You haven't much time before you have to return to Booty Bay!
QuestData.RewardText: The fewer Bloodsail Buccaneers that Booty Bay has to fight, the better. However, it might be best to stop slaughtering your supposed allies before you draw suspicion to yourself.
